shadow.name: DIVISION
shadow.description: Perpetual conflict, seeing others as threats or competitors
shadow.behavioral_signature: Defensive positioning, us vs them mentality
shadow.thought_pattern: I must defend my position. They're against me.

gift.name: GUIDANCE
gift.description: Natural capacity to lead through demonstrated competence
gift.behavioral_signature: Others seek your direction, servant leadership
gift.thought_pattern: I guide by example. Leadership is service.

siddhi.name: VIRTUE
siddhi.description: Leadership that serves the highest good of all
siddhi.somatic_signature: Transparent power, no separation between leader and led
siddhi.thought_pattern: There is no leader, only the flow serving itself.

inversion_protocols.script: You are not under attack. The G center's role is to guide, not to defend territory. True leadership requires no force. When you feel defensive, you are confusing guidance with control. Guidance emerges when invited, not imposed.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Notice where your body is braced. Soften your shoulders. Drop your jaw. Release the guard.

experiment.hypothesis: If I stop defending my position and simply model the behavior, others will naturally follow.
experiment.action: For 3 days, give zero unsolicited advice. Demonstrate only. Wait for requests.

success_criteria.target: Others ask for guidance without being told
